CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
Specify the model of the connected controller. Currently supported models are: `deltasol_bs_plus`, `deltasol_c`, `deltasol_cs2`, `deltasol_cs_plus`.

*See also: [vbus Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#sensor)*

Specify the model of the connected controller. Currently supported models are: `deltasol_bs_plus`, `deltasol_c`, `deltasol_cs2`, `deltasol_cs_plus`.

*See also: [vbus Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#binary-sensor)*
